channel.title: Aah! Snake!
channel.description:
Hi,
A while ago I created [url=http://tundraprogram.com/game4/game.html]this[/url] game, Snake. Please play/rate it and comment on the source code (attached). No flaming please and have fun, if you're playing it...
~Matt
P.S.: I know it's a decompiled source code, but I made that game for a community, and accidentally deleted the newest version source code, so... to get it I decompiled it, easy enough.
EDIT: Link fixed

item.title: Aah! Snake!
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:226480”][quote author=supamagier link=topic=297599.msg2391636#msg2391636 date=1218989568]
I do have the src code, but I made that game for a community, and accidentally deleted the newest version source code, so… To get it I decompiled it, easy enough.

fixed link.
[/quote]Liar.[/quote]
No not. Ask Tundraprogram’s owner Chris.

Read full topic

Where’s ruler??[/quote]
the bank is from rsca, so I guess he’ll replace ruler.

item.title: Aah! Snake!
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

You posted a local link probably by accident (http://\laptop\shareddocs\game4\game.html/) and the source code is “decompiled” with jad. What else can I say?

Oh, it’s nice to see people finish something
